item.title: About
item.description: some text introducing the project All texts were written by Alexander Bauer & Johannes Stark Resources for this website: The website is based on blogdown, using the hermit theme Some clip art graphics were taken from pixabay.com The snowflake animation was taken from premiumcoding.com Christmas songs were arranged and performed by Alexander Bauer Audio player icons were made by Chanut from flaticon.com A big thanks goes to: Carina “Nina” Landgraf for valuable gag suggestions The Loretta Bar (including Bud Spencer) in Munich for an inspiring writing atmosphere The Wank for the insight that the world is missing Data Science-themed Christmas stories

item.description: Chapter 1 will be published on the first Advent. Stay tuned!
